com.lavanya.escalade.controller

Class TopoMainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lavanya.escalade.controller.TopoMainController

  • @Controller
public class TopoMainController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller used in MVC architecture to control all the requests related to Topo object.
    Author:
    lavanya

      • initBinder

        @InitBinder
public void initBinder(org.springframework.web.bind.WebDataBinder binder)

      • showTopoForm

        @GetMapping(value="/createTopo/{siteId}")
public java.lang.String showTopoForm(@PathVariable(value="siteId")
                                                                                int id,
                                                                                @AuthenticationPrincipal
                                                                                MyUserDetails userConnected,
                                                                                org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        GET requests for /createTopo/{siteId} endpoint. This controller-method creates a new object Topo and pass it to the form for the user to create a Topo with all its attributes.
        Parameters:
        id, - int to specify the site's id whose the topo in creation is associated.
        model - to pass data to the view.
        userConnected - is the authenticated User passed within the object MyUserDetails.
        Returns:
        addTopo.html.

      • saveTopo

        @PostMapping(value="/saveTopo")
public java.lang.String saveTopo(@Valid @ModelAttribute(value="topo")
                                                                  @Valid Topo topo,
                                                                  org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                                                  org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        POST request to send data to /saveTopo endpoint. This controller-method is part of CRUD and is used to save a Topo in database.
        Parameters:
        topo - is the object Topo that needs to be saved.
        result - represents binding results, registers errors and allows for a Validator to be applied.
        model - to pass data to the view.
        Returns:
        the url /topo/{id}.

      • showListOfToposOfUser

        @GetMapping(value="/user/topos")
public java.lang.String showListOfToposOfUser(@AuthenticationPrincipal
                                                                                MyUserDetails userConnected,
                                                                                org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        GET requests for /user/topos endpoint. This controller-method retrieves from database all topos created by the authenticated user and pass that list to the view "userTopos.html".
        Parameters:
        model - to pass data to the view.
        userConnected - is the authenticated User passed within the object MyUserDetails.
        Returns:
        userTopos.html.

      • showToposListByPage

        @GetMapping(value="/topos")
public java.lang.String showToposListByPage(@AuthenticationPrincipal
                                                                         MyUserDetails userConnected,
                                                                         @RequestParam(value="pageNumber")
                                                                         int currentPage,
                                                                         org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        GET requests for /topos endpoint. This controller-method retrieves from database all topos created by all users and pass that list to the view "toposList.html".
        Parameters:
        model - to pass data to the view.
        currentPage, - an int to specify which page of Topos to be displayed.
        userConnected - is the authenticated User passed within the object MyUserDetails.
        Returns:
        toposList.html

      • getTopo

        @GetMapping(value="/topo/{id}")
public java.lang.String getTopo(@AuthenticationPrincipal
                                                                 MyUserDetails userConnected,
                                                                 @PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                 int id,
                                                                 Topo topo,
                                                                 org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        GET requests for /topo/{id} endpoint. This controller-method retrieves from database all data related to a Topo of interest. Those data are then passed to the model and displayed in the view "topo.html".
        Parameters:
        model - to pass data to the view.
        id - an int to specify the id of the Topo object to be displayed.
        userConnected - is the authenticated User passed within the object MyUserDetails.
        topo - object Topo to be displayed in the view.
        Returns:
        topo.html

      • setReservation

        @PostMapping(value="/reservation")
public java.lang.String setReservation(Topo topo,
                                                                           org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        POST request to send data to /reservation endpoint. This controller-method is part of CRUD and is used to update a Topo in database. The update concerns the reservation attribute of Topo to accept or not a reservation.
        Parameters:
        topo - is the object Topo whose reservation attribute needs to be updated.
        model - to pass data to the view.
        Returns:
        the url /user/topos

      • sendRequestForReservation

        @PostMapping(value="/request/reservation")
public java.lang.String sendRequestForReservation(Topo topo,
                                                                                              org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        POST request to send data to /request/reservation endpoint. This controller-method is part of CRUD and is used to update a Topo in database. The update concerns the reservation attribute of Topo to request a reservation.
        Parameters:
        topo - is the object Topo whose reservation attribute needs to be updated.
        model - to pass data to the view.
        Returns:
        the url /user/topos

      • showNextPagesOfToposToVisitors

        @GetMapping(value="/showTopos")
public java.lang.String showNextPagesOfToposToVisitors(@AuthenticationPrincipal
                                                                                        MyUserDetails userConnected,
                                                                                        @RequestParam(value="pageNumber")
                                                                                        int currentPage,
                                                                                        org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        GET requests for /showTopos endpoint. This controller-method retrieves all topos created by all users and display them as Page to the view "toposListForUserConnected.html".
        Parameters:
        model - to pass data to the view.
        currentPage - an int to specify which page of Topos to be displayed.
        userConnected - is the authenticated User passed within the object MyUserDetails
        Returns:
        "toposListForUserConnected.html".
